about_the_game:
Dive into the world of social entrepreneurship with Startup Quest Bakery, a brief simulation game that challenges you to set up and run a bakery social enterprise successfully. This game serves as a dynamic introduction to startup operations, putting your strategic decision-making to the test.

The Challenge
You've made it to the final round of a prestigious European Union competition, contending for a grand prize by demonstrating your prowess in managing a socially responsible bakery. The ultimate test? Navigate a multi-area game simulation where your mission is to "escape" by establishing a thriving business within 36 months. Explore dedicated rooms—Action, Knowledge, Skills, and Sustainable—to make informed decisions. Achieve profitability while making a positive social impact and minimizing environmental footprints.

Getting Started
Before the flour settles, you'll tackle critical steps like securing necessary permits and conducting market research to finely tune your product offerings to the community's needs. From selecting the perfect location to choosing sustainable energy options and the right bakery equipment—every decision counts.

Strategic Choices
Opt between essential business elements such as insurance and energy sources (like going solar). Your bakery’s success hinges on these decisions along with the selection of skilled bakers and salespersons. Their unique talents will significantly influence customer satisfaction and operational efficiency.

Operational Dynamics
Once set up, take charge of monthly production decisions. Choose from an array of products including white bread, baguettes, whole grain bread, pretzels, and pita bread. Monitor your bakery's performance through straightforward financial reports, adjusting strategies as needed to ensure growth and sustainability.

Social Entrepreneurship
As a social entrepreneur, balance is key. Your role involves harmonizing economic viability with social responsibility and environmental stewardship.

Embark on your Startup Quest Bakery adventure and show the world the impact a socially conscious bakery can make!

“E-VENTURE Gamification Experience - Startup Quest Bakery” was developed within the project “E-VENTURE. Promotion of Entrepreneurship of Young People with Fewer Opportunities in Europe” by Predict CSD Consulting, in collaboration with Eveho Private Foundation - Spain, Arsis - Association for the Social Support of Youth – Greece and LiberaMente - Italy

name: Startup Quest Bakery

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Dual core or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DX12 compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: -
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Dual core or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DX12 compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: -

short_description: Embark on a brief entrepreneurial journey to establish and manage a socially responsible bakery. Obtain permits, prepare the space, choose your equipment, and produce various breads. Aim for profitability while positively impacting society and the environment.
supported_languages: English, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Greek, Romanian
